articles.author: Pierre Bairin, Amandine Hess and Radina Gigova, CNN
articles.title: Beluga whale rescued from Seine River dies in transit, authorities say
articles.description: A beluga whale that was rescued after being stuck in France's Seine River for more than a week died while in transit to the sea, officials have confirmed.
articles.content: A beluga whale that was rescued after being stuck in France's Seine River for more than a week died while in transit to the sea, officials have confirmed.

articles.title: China withdraws promise not to send troops to Taiwan if it takes control of island
articles.description: China has withdrawn a promise not to send troops or administrators to Taiwan if it takes control of the island, an official document showed on Wednesday, signalling a decision by President Xi Jinping to grant less autonomy than previously offered.

articles.title: Grand jury won’t indict White woman linked to Emmett Till’s lynching

articles.description: A Nebraska mother and her teenage daughter are facing criminal charges following the teen's abortion in April in a case where police obtained their Facebook messages about the abortion through a search warrant, according to published reports.
